original_title: No shortage of Heavy Marcaine drug used for C-section surgeries: Keheliya
original_body_lines: There is no shortage of Heavy Marcaine drug used for elective cesarean section surgeries as reported, Health Minister Keheliya Rambukwella said today.

He told Parliament that 30,000 vials of Heavy Marcaine drug are in stock by today and that 50 more vials have been provided to the Teaching Hospital Kalutara after being informed of the shortage of this drug.
The Minister said there was a delay in purchasing the particular drug as there was a discussion over the price hike of the drug.(Ajith Siriwardana and Yohan Perera)
